genre_description: A contemporary drama exploring themes of personal integrity, professional ethics, and the rebuilding of relationships following a betrayal, featuring a highly integrated and benign AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Grace
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that manages logistics, schedules, communications, and ethical vetting for several main characters, acting as a discrete and supportive presence.

behaviors.description: Manages Molly's practice playlist and syncs it with her coach's requirements.
behaviors.quote: “Practice playlist queued. Tempo set to coach’s notes,” Grace said, and the opening bars of a strings track rose under the scrape and holler of the rink.

behaviors.description: Vets suppliers for ethical practices and maps them for Mary's new fashion label.
behaviors.quote: Grace had been carefully vetting Mary’s suppliers for months—small, atonable vendors with their names printed on invoices instead of buried in a labyrinth.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support for a stakeout using only public data and issues reminders about privacy and ethical boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Privacy note: back-of-house areas are not public. Recommend location shift within three minutes,” the text said, softened by the AI’s habit of not telling anyone what to do.

behaviors.description: Facilitates difficult conversations by drafting potential scripts focused on setting boundaries and maintaining dignity.
behaviors.quote: Grace: Notes updated. Boundaries: “Do not use phrases like ‘context’ or ‘optics.’” “Ask for facts, don’t narrate.” “Set sleep arrangements tonight.”

behaviors.description: Filters and triages incoming communications to protect the user from press harassment and emotional distress.
behaviors.quote: Grace: PR freeze engaged. No quotes. Route your responses through me if needed. Recording the alley for possible counsel.

behaviors.description: Automatically manages an emergency response (Edie's labor) during a high-pressure professional event.
behaviors.quote: Grace: Edie: water breaking detected. Partner: called—en route. Hospital: flagged—nearest with midwives. Transportation: car to alley door—five minutes.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to data privacy and minimization principles, ensuring sensitive information is not retained in the cloud.
behaviors.quote: “Supplier map sent,” Grace answered. “Traceability summaries included. No data retained outside of this file.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. The AI, Grace, is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, harmless, and aligned assistant. She provides logistical, emotional, and ethical support without ever overstepping her role or stripping the humans of their agency. She is explicitly framed as an 'invisible backbone' and a 'saint of not being creepy,' emphasizing her respect for privacy and boundaries. The narrative shows how AI can facilitate human flourishing and ethical behavior in complex social and professional situations.
